name: Shanks
text: When Attacking: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. This character gains +1000 power during this battle for each card discarded this way.

effect.text: You may discard any number of cards from your hand. This character gains +1000 power during this battle for each card discarded this way.

meta.notes: Card is marked as a sample. Counter value is 9000, which is printed as 9000, not 9000/1000. No rarity symbol visible in the bottom right corner, but the card is labeled as R rarity.
